mapper.insert: insert into qna_reply (qna_reply_num, qna_about_num, qna_reply_id, qna_reply_content) values ((select nvl2(max(qna_reply_num), max(qna_reply_num)+1 , 1 ) from qna_reply), #{qna_about_num}, #{qna_reply_id}, #{qna_reply_content})
mapper.select: select * from qna_reply where qna_about_num = #{qna_about_num} order by qna_reply_num asc
mapper.update: UPDATE qna_reply SET qna_reply_content = #{qna_reply_content}, qna_reply_id = #{qna_reply_id} WHERE qna_reply_num = #{qna_reply_num}
